[00:00.00]Chicago Freestyle (Explicit) - Drake/Giveon
[00:00.16]Lyrics by：Aubrey Graham/N. Cadastre/R. Thomas, Jr./G. Evans/M. Mathers/J. Bass/S. King
[00:00.32]Composed by：Aubrey Graham/N. Cadastre/R. Thomas, Jr./G. Evans/M. Mathers/J. Bass/S. King
[00:00.48]Two-thirty baby won't you meet me by The Bean
[00:04.53]Too early maybe later you can show me things
[00:09.21]You know what it is whenever I visit
[00:12.83]Windy city she blowin' me kisses no
[00:17.24]Thirty degrees way too cold so hold me tight
[00:21.09]Will I see you at the show tonight
[00:25.05]Will I see you at the show tonight
[00:30.98]Ayy truck to the plane to the truck
[00:35.19]Truck to the hotel lobby
[00:37.12]Me I go through underground garages
[00:39.11]Presidential suite on deposit
[00:41.10]Elevator up to the room
[00:42.95]Shower up and then we hit the club
[00:45.09]Touchdown gotta see what's up
[00:47.02]Area code in my phone
[00:48.94]What numbers do I still have
[00:50.84]Who do I know from the past
[00:52.78]Hit one she say she got a man
[00:54.78]Hit another one it goes green
[00:56.75]Must've changed phones on the team
[00:58.87]'Member when you let me in between
[01:00.49]That was 2017
[01:02.72]All good Chubbs'll look around
[01:04.53]Find one that seem my type
[01:06.40]That my dawg and he know what I like
[01:08.39]He done found me plenty in my life
[01:10.32]Problem is I meet a girl tonight
[01:12.27]Then I go and treat her too nice
[01:14.22]Galleria credit card swipes
[01:16.22]I don't even know if she a wife
[01:18.59]But I do know one thing though
[01:20.45]Women they come they go
[01:22.36]Saturday through Sunday Monday
[01:24.26]Monday through Sunday yo
[01:26.35]Maybe I'll love you one day
[01:28.14]Maybe we'll someday grow
[01:30.08]'Til then I'll sit my drunk a*s on that runway
[01:32.84]On this one way
[01:34.29]Two-thirty baby won't you meet me by The Bean
[01:38.04]Too early maybe later you can show me things
[01:43.00]You know what it is whenever I visit
[01:46.61]Windy city she blowin' me kisses no
[01:50.95]Thirty degrees way too cold so hold me tight
[01:54.91]Will I see you at the show tonight
[01:58.70]Will I see you at the show tonight
[02:07.16]Jewelry in the safe on arrival
[02:08.94]Pistol on J for survival
[02:10.86]Lot of people gunnin' for the title
[02:12.71]Lot of people tryna take us viral
[02:14.65]I'm just tryna have a nice night though
[02:16.68]Waiter brought the check for the meal
[02:18.44]She said "Babe I think there was a typo"
[02:20.49]Nah girl I got it that's light though
[02:22.47]I could show you bigger things than that
[02:24.41]It's gon' be a minute 'til I'm back
[02:26.47]Let me give you images that last
[02:28.53]AMEX had a limit in the past
[02:30.28]I had plenty women in the past
[02:32.28]I done plenty sinnin' in the past
[02:34.25]You don't need to know but you can ask
[02:38.14]Stickin' on your backstage pass
[02:40.18]All access 'cause you bad
[02:42.11]You could go wherever with that a*s
[02:44.02]Show to the shower to the truck
[02:45.98]Truck to the club for the party
[02:48.02]You go in first with your girls
[02:49.83]'Cause I don't know who's out there watchin'
[02:52.04]But I do know one thing though
[02:54.08]Women they come they go
[02:56.00]Saturday through Sunday Monday
[02:58.22]Monday Sunday yo
[02:59.97]Maybe I'll love you one day
[03:01.82]Maybe we'll someday grow
[03:03.79]Till then I'll sit my drunk a*s on that runway
[03:06.41]On this one way
[03:07.99]Two-thirty baby won't you meet me by The Bean
[03:11.74]Too early maybe later you can show me things
[03:16.52]You know what it is whenever I visit
[03:20.30]Windy city she blowin' me kisses no
[03:24.62]Thirty degrees way too cold so hold me tight
[03:28.42]Will I see you at the show tonight
[03:32.26]Will I see you at the show tonight
data.trans:
[ti:Chicago Freestyle (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/Giveon]
[al:Dark Lane Demo Tapes (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.16]//
[00:00.32]//
[00:00.48]凌晨两点半 你会不会与我在芝加哥的云门相见
[00:04.53]为时尚早 也许稍候你可以向我吐露心意
[00:09.21]你知道我每次都饱含深情来到此地
[00:12.83]我游走风城 仿佛寒风亲吻我的脸颊
[00:17.24]接近零度的气温 天寒地冻 抱紧我
[00:21.09]今晚你会不会来看我的演出
[00:25.05]今晚你会不会来看我的演出
[00:30.98]舟车劳顿 几经周转
[00:35.19]驱车抵达酒店大堂
[00:37.12]我穿过地下车库
[00:39.11]预订总统套房
[00:41.10]乘坐电梯直达房间
[00:42.95]沐浴更衣 我们抵达夜店
[00:45.09]抵达目的地 我要看看究竟是怎么回事
[00:47.02]我手机上显示着区号
[00:48.94]我还留着谁的电话号码
[00:50.84]曾经的那些过客 我还记得谁
[00:52.78]随意拨通电话 她说她已找到爱人
[00:54.78]打给另外一个女孩 号码已变成空号
[00:56.75]一定是换掉了手机
[00:58.87]还记得当初你让我神魂颠倒
[01:00.49]那是2017年的事了
[01:02.72]美女云集 Chubbs环顾四周
[01:04.53]找到一个正合我心意的女孩
[01:06.40]我朋友知道我喜欢的类型
[01:08.39]他帮我物色不少妞
[01:10.32]可问题是 我今晚遇见一位女孩
[01:12.27]我为她着迷 对她百般宠爱
[01:14.22]我任由她在Galleria购物中心刷卡购物
[01:16.22]我不知道她能否与我携手共度一生
[01:18.59]可我明白
[01:20.45]女孩们来了又走
[01:22.36]从周六到周日
[01:24.26]从周一到周日 时间慢慢流逝
[01:26.35]也许有一天我会爱上你
[01:28.14]也许有一天我们的感情会迅速升温
[01:30.08]直到那时 我们会尽情玩闹
[01:32.84]相爱一生
[01:34.29]凌晨两点半 你会不会与我在芝加哥的云门相见
[01:38.04]为时尚早 也许稍候你可以向我吐露心意
[01:43.00]你知道我每次都饱含深情来到此地
[01:46.61]我游走风城 仿佛寒风亲吻我的脸颊
[01:50.95]接近零度的气温 天寒地冻 抱紧我
[01:54.91]今晚你会不会来看我的演出
[01:58.70]今晚你会不会来看我的演出
[02:07.16]珠宝随时放在保险箱里
[02:08.94]我枪不离身 只为保护自己
[02:10.86]许多人想看我跌落云端
[02:12.71]许多人把我们当做眼中钉
[02:14.65]我只想纵享良宵
[02:16.68]侍者送来了昂贵的账单
[02:18.44]她说 宝贝 我觉得这账单金额不对吧
[02:20.49]亲爱的 我懂了 这顿饭钱不值一提
[02:22.47]我可以送你更奢华的礼物
[02:24.41]稍等片刻 我马上就回来
[02:26.47]让我给你留下深刻的印象
[02:28.53]我以前用着限额信用卡
[02:30.28]我以前身边美女环绕
[02:32.28]我以前犯下许多罪孽
[02:34.25]你不必知道可你有权过问
[02:38.14]给你一张后台通行证
[02:40.18]你畅通无阻 因为你性感迷人
[02:42.11]你的美貌让你混迹四方
[02:44.02]演出结束 沐浴更衣 开着车子
[02:45.98]马不停蹄来到夜店 尽情狂欢
[02:48.02]你带着你的朋友抢先登场
[02:49.83]因为我不知道还有谁对你垂涎三尺
[02:52.04]可我明白
[02:54.08]女孩们来了又走
[02:56.00]从周六到周日
[02:58.22]从周一到周日 时间慢慢流逝
[02:59.97]也许有一天我会爱上你
[03:01.82]也许有一天我们的感情会迅速升温
[03:03.79]直到那时 我们会尽情玩闹
[03:06.41]相爱一生
[03:07.99]凌晨两点半 你会不会与我在芝加哥的云门相见
[03:11.74]为时尚早 也许稍候你可以向我吐露心意
[03:16.52]你知道我每次都饱含深情来到此地
[03:20.30]我游走风城 仿佛寒风亲吻我的脸颊
[03:24.62]接近零度的气温 天寒地冻 抱紧我
[03:28.42]今晚你会不会来看我的演出
[03:32.26]今晚你会不会来看我的演出
